label: AB2C5D_tI36_140_a_h_cl_b-001
title: BaLa$_{2}$ZnO$_{5}$ Structure
comments:
Some authors designate Sr(Sr$_{0.5}$Gd$_{0.5}$)$_{2}$GaO$_{5}$ as the prototype for this structure, with the (8h) site randomly occupied by strontium and gadolinium atoms.  We prefer a structure with ordered atoms on this site. 
 Removing the O-I atoms from the (4c) site reduces this to the \href{current_web_home_dir/A5BC2_tI32_140_bl_a_h-001}{NH$_{4}$Pb$_{2}$Br$_{5}$ ($K3_{4}$) structure}. 
 This is the quaternary form of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A5BC3_tI36_140_cl_b_ah-001}{Cs$_{3}$CoCl$_{5}$ ($K3_{1}$) structure}.
